title: @Riot ....about kata nerf.
body:
So kata is a high risk, high reward champion...she is all about timing and position....when teamfights begins you need to cc and get rid of her because if you dont then....you may hear quadrakill or pentakill sound.

I get the voracity nerf...I get the hp per lvl, the hp regen, and the base hp nerf...

The first one was to nerf her teamfight cleaning mechanics....the second one to her laning phase.

But I....dont get this nerf.
**Shunpo (E) damage reduced to 40/70/100/130/160 from 60/85/110/135/160
Shunpo (E) AP ratio reduced to .25 from .4
**

This aim to nerf what in katarina?

Her laning phase is really weak now...with that nerf in the ap ratio you really dont have a chance in laning phase of winning a trade since you dont max shupo first or second.....unless the other person is lagging or you have your jungler with you.

Maybe you guys see shunpo as a spell that you use only to jump in and out....that was the idea with the mini rework you were going to do......
if that the idea then why not lower the cd? or lower the cd by seconds is the mark is proc...or something like that?
 
Thanks for the reading, and sorry for the typos!

replies.body: I really don't care how hard they nerf Katarina. She's been an OP face roll champ for too long. They need to gut Annie and Leblanc as well.
Well , I think Riot ** really** wants to nerf Kata's early game :/
